## Description {#details}

Describes a PHI node that may or may not exist.

These track the PHIs that must be created if we sunk a sequence of instructions. It provides a hash function for efficient equality comparisons.

Definition at line 221 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/gvnsink-cpp">GVNSink.cpp</a>.
